select count(*) from project

select project_title, project_photo, project_contract, sum(option_price) as sumop, (to_days(p.enddate) - to_days(now())) as remainingDay, round(sum(option_price) / targetprice * 100, 2) as reachper, timestampdiff(hour, now(), enddate) as nam from support s left join `option` o on s.option_no = o.option_no right join project p on o.project_no = p.project_no

group by p.project_no limit #{startRow}, #{pagePerSize}
